code: /** @format */import React from"react";import{Alert}from"@mui/material";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export var ActionAlerts=function ActionAlerts(status){switch(status){case"OK":return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Alert,{severity:"success",children:"Sussues"});case"error":return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Alert,{severity:"error",children:"Error"});default:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Alert,{severity:"info",children:"Something went wronge Please tryagain"});}};export var TotalDays=function TotalDays(date1,date2){var dt1=new Date(date1);var dt2=new Date(date2);return Math.floor((Date.UTC(dt2.getFullYear(),dt2.getMonth(),dt2.getDate())-Date.UTC(dt1.getFullYear(),dt1.getMonth(),dt1.getDate()))/(1000*60*60*24));};export var GetDate=function GetDate(date){var newDate=date.getFullYear()+"-"+(date.getMonth()+1)+"-"+date.getDate();return newDate;};export var GetTime=function GetTime(time){var newTime=time.getHours()+":"+time.getMinutes()+":"+time.getSeconds();return newTime;};
